articles.title: 'The Batman' star Robert Pattinson got in trouble for stealing socks - Insider
articles.description: In a new interview with BBC Radio 1's Ali Plumb, Pattinson said that it's "impossible" to steal anything, but he managed to get plenty of socks.
articles.content:
Robert Pattinson said that he managed to swipe items from the set of "The Batman," but got scolded for doing so.
